title: Bison and Brown Rice Stuffed Peppers

Ingredients.4: 6  green bell peppers - tops, seeds, and membranes removed

Ingredients.11: 1 salt and ground black pepper to taste

Directions.1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

Directions.2: Bring water and rice to a boil in a saucepan. Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until the rice is tender and liquid has been absorbed, about 20 minutes.

Directions.3: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook and stir bison in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes; drain and discard grease.

Directions.4: Arrange bell peppers, cut-side up, in a baking dish. Slice bottoms of peppers if needed so they stand upright.

Directions.5: Mix rice, bison, tomato sauce, Worcestershire sauce, oregano, all-purpose seasoning, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and pepper together in a bowl. Spoon rice-bison mixture into each bell pepper.

Directions.6: Mix diced tomatoes and Italian seasoning together in a bowl; pour over stuffed peppers.

Directions.7: Bake in the preheated oven, basting with diced tomatoes mixture every 15 minutes, until peppers are tender, about 1 hour.
